reviewText: I loved the movie but I also loved the soundtrack.  Where is the soundtrack?

Not sure why this is listed as from "$499" for the DVD.  It was a wonderful movie, but not that great.  I'm sure you can pick it up at a used DVD store.  Wonderful story about how the "American Disabilities Act" came into the mainstream, and a great performance by underrated actors like Ron Livingstone.  Rent it.  Stream it.  Just don't pay $500 for a DVD.
